name: Time is Money (Nonakesh)
description:
Press space to pause time and place buildings, but be aware, pausing drains your time!

You can only build while the game is paused.

Earn time by killing enemies and building mines.

Controls:

  • WASD or move mouse to screen border: Move camera
  • Space: Pause and unpause
  • Number keys 1-4: Build buildings
  • Esc: Game menu
